vista.graph
Interface DrawableComposite

All Superinterfaces:
Drawable
All Known Implementing Classes:
Axis, CurveContainer, FluxElement, GEContainer, Graph, LayeredSchematic, Legend, LegendItem, MultiPlot, MultiScatterPlot, PieChart, Plot, PolyLineElement, Schematic, TickText, TimeDisplayElement
public interface DrawableComposite
extends Drawable

This is an interface to a composite of drawable elements. A drawing iterator should be implemented to define the order of drawing.

Version:
$Id: DrawableComposite.java,v 1.1 2003/10/02 20:48:54 redwood Exp $
Author:
Nicky Sandhu (DWR).

          reorders element container array to place the given element at the first index.

          reorders element container array to place the given element at the last index.

Methods inherited from interface vista.graph.Drawable
draw, draw, draw, draw, getAttributes, getGraphics, isVisible, setAttributes, setGraphics, setVisible
 

Method Detail

drawFirst

void drawFirst(Drawable ge)
reorders element container array to place the given element at the first index. This has the effect of drawing this element before others.

Parameters:
ge - The graphic element to place at the beginning.

drawLast

void drawLast(Drawable ge)
reorders element container array to place the given element at the last index. This has the effect of drawing this element after others.

Parameters:
ge - The graphic element to place at the beginning.

setDrawIterator

void setDrawIterator(DrawIterator iterator)
set the iterator to be used to specify drawing order.

getDrawIterator

DrawIterator getDrawIterator()
get the iterator used to specify drawing order
